caption:
TABLE 1 
Exploration of different training strategies for two-stream ConvNets on 
the UCF101 dataset (split 1). Here, "from scratch" refers to the case 
we initialize the CNN parameters with Gaussian distribution. 
Experiments here are conducted without TSN.

TABLE 3

(train on the training set and test on the validation set). We use the average consensus function in these experiments.

caption:
TABLE 5 
Exploration of different very deep ConvNet architectures on the 
UCF101 dataset (over three splits). "BN-Inception+TSN" refers to the 
setting where the temporal segment networkframework is applied on 
top of the best performing BN-Inception [59] architecture. 
Training setting 
Spatial Temporal Two-Stream 
VGG-M [66] (from [1]) 
73.0% 
83.7% 
86.9% 
GoogLeNet [9] (from [67]) 
75.3% 
85.8% 
89.3% 
VGGNet-16 [8] (from [67]) 
78.4% 
87.0% 
91.4% 
ResNet-152 [29] (from [68]) 
83.4% 
87.2% 
91.8% 
BN-Inception [59] 
85.0% 
88.3% 
92.4% 
BN-Inception+TSN 
86.4% 
90.1% 
94.9%

caption:
TABLE 6 
Evaluation on the validation set of ActivityNet challenge 2016 data. 
"Bn-Inception w/o TSN" indicates that we train the models without TSN.

TABLE 7 
Winning entries in the untrimmed video classification task of ActivityNet 
challenge 2016. We present the recognition accuracies in the form of 
mAP values and top-1 accuracies. The entries were ranked by mAP 
values in the challenge. 
Team 
mAP 
Top1 Accuracy
